computeHorizonDistance

public double computeHorizonDistance()
Description copied from interface: View
Gets the distance from the View's eye point to the horizon point on the last rendered Globe.

Note: Use this method judiciously because it can be expensive. Call View.getFarClipDistance() instead. It's value is usually the same as the horizon distance.

Specified by:
computeHorizonDistance in interface View
Overrides:
computeHorizonDistance in class BasicView
Returns:
the distance from the eye point to the horizon.

computeHorizonDistance

protected double computeHorizonDistance(Vec4 eyePoint)
